title: Why does Google pixel 3XL screen go black after dialling phone number. Keypad rendered useless.
content:
As soon as I'd finished keying in a phone number, the phone's screen went completely black and could not be resuscitated, not even with power button.
Keypad disappeared, but audio was still apparent.
When call was finished, I regained the phone's display, but problem recurs every time I finish using the keypad.
I have tried the following:
Restart.
Power off and on again.
Changed display options - turned off always on display.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
